thread.title: Québec Bourse introduces its Board of Directors

author: cnbc.com
title: Québec Bourse introduces its Board of Directors

organizations.name: secrétaire corporatif neptune technologies & bioressources inc

text:
MONTREAL, May 30, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- At its annual meeting held on May 23, 2018, Québec Bourse members have elected the Board of Directors for the current year.
The list of Québec Bourse 2018 Board of Directors, in alphabetical order:
Frédéric Beausoleil , Director, Investment Banking, Desjardins Securities Inc.
Jean-Daniel Bélanger , Vice-président, Affaires juridiques et Secrétaire Corporatif Neptune Technologies & Bioressources Inc.
Nicole Blanchard , President, Sun International Communications
Marc Blanchet , Chief Financial Officer, H2O Innovation Inc.
André P. Boulet , President and Chief Executive Officer, Devonian Health Group Inc.
Patrick Bossé , Partner and Québec Leader, Ernst & Young LLP
Pierre Boucher , Partner and Executive Vice-President, MaisonBrison Inc.
Isabelle Cadieux , Investment Manager, SIDEX
Benoit Cyr , Vice-President and Chief Financial Officer, BTB REIT
Louis Doyle , Executive Director, Québec Bourse
Martin Garand , Investment Director, Small-cap Companies, Caisse de dépôt et placement du Québec
Richard Provencher , Partner and Securities Coordonnator, Stein Monast LLP
Érika Tremblay-Gagnon , Senior Director, Financial Information and Compliance, Stingray Digital Group Inc.
Québec Bourse also takes this opportunity to thank the outgoing directors; Patrick Montpetit, Luc Tanguay and Nicolas Vanasse for their significant contribution and commitment.
About Québec Bourse:
Québec Bourse Inc. is an association grouping Québec public companies and other stakeholders forming the public market ecosystem. Québec Bourse counts 92 members. Established as the voice of Québec’s public companies and their key representative in dealing with regulatory and government authorities, Québec Bourse also aims among other things, to increase members’ visibility, to foster collaboration, networking and exchange of best practices among members.
INFORMATION:
Louis Doyle, Executive Director, Québec Bourse
